project_abstract.cdata: The Industrial Export Finance Project is intended to help with the development of efficient export oriented industries. In line with this objective the project is expected to develop three areas. First, the country's industrial base will be expanded by increasing manufactured exports. This will be accomplished by financing investments in export industries and helping develop marketing capabilities. Second, economic and administrative conditions under which exporters operate will be improved. Finally, appraisal capabilities of financial and other institutions concerned with export and with industrial restructuring will be strengthened and promoted.
